company.name: Aktonz Estate Agents
company.tagline: London lettings, sales and asset management
company.mission: We combine deep local expertise with smart data insights to match every client with the right property faster.
services: Tailored search for renters, buyers and corporate relocations
End-to-end landlord services including compliance, marketing and portfolio strategy
Sales progression with proactive weekly updates
Instant viewing scheduling and digital offer negotiation

landlordOverview: Aktonz blends premium marketing, careful compliance control and proactive tenancy management so landlords achieve the strongest rents with zero stress.

landlordServiceTiers.name: Tenant find
landlordServiceTiers.summary: Photography, premium listings, viewings and referencing with offer negotiation handled within 24 hours.
highlights: Professional photography and 4K video tours within 48 hours
Accompanied viewings seven days a week
Digital offers portal with full referencing

landlordServiceTiers.name: Rent collection
landlordServiceTiers.summary: Everything in tenant find plus rent collection, statements and arrears chasing within 3 working days.
highlights: Automated rent reminders and arrears escalation
Monthly landlord statements delivered via the portal
Renewal benchmarking at least 90 days before tenancy end

landlordServiceTiers.name: Full management
landlordServiceTiers.summary: Portfolio-style service with compliance tracking, 24/7 maintenance triage and resident experience reporting.
highlights: EICR, gas safety and licence renewals tracked with reminders
Approved contractor panel with negotiated rates
Resident satisfaction reporting and retention planning

landlordManagementHighlights: Dedicated landlord success manager with WhatsApp updates
Asset plans showing rent reviews, compliance expiries and renewal milestones
24/7 maintenance triage and repair approval workflow
Resident experience surveys after every key touchpoint
landlordValuationSteps: Digital pricing benchmark sent within two hours of enquiry
In-person valuation with lettings director to agree pricing strategy
Launch campaign scheduled with staging, photography and portal upload
Weekly performance reporting covering viewings, feedback and offers

landlordFaqs.question: What lettings fee do you charge?
landlordFaqs.answer: Our tenant-find service is 6% + VAT with no up-front marketing costs. Rent collection is 8% + VAT and full management is 12% + VAT which includes compliance tracking, renewals and maintenance oversight.

landlordFaqs.question: Do you cover compliance and licensing?
landlordFaqs.answer: Yes — the management team tracks gas safety, EICR, EPC, HMO and selective licensing deadlines. We book inspections, hold certificates centrally and alert you at least 60 days before renewal dates.

landlordFaqs.question: How quickly can you let my property?
landlordFaqs.answer: Most Aktonz instructions secure qualified tenants in 14 days or less. We build a marketing calendar immediately, pre-qualify applicants from our database and provide feedback after every viewing.

landlordFaqs.question: What happens once a tenant is found?
landlordFaqs.answer: We carry out Right to Rent checks, collect move-in funds, arrange inventory and check-in, and deliver a welcome pack so the tenancy starts smoothly. If you choose management we remain first contact for residents.

landlordOnboardingIntro: Share a few details and I'll get a lettings valuation and onboarding pack arranged for you.
landlordConfirmation: You'll receive a confirmation email with valuation details and our service summary straight away.
